item.title: (HAMSTER) APPEAL
item.description: NOTICE This is a post tagged with HAMSTER, but it’s acturally written by me. To put it briefly, Hamster got a punishment by dismissal only because he tied his shoes in the English lesson. I don’t think this is fair for him. CONTENT - Lodge an appeal for Hamster, even though no one will listen to it. NOTE: 大仓 stands for Hamster. This is written in Chinese. 定义

item.title: NEVER MIND
item.description: NEVER MIND NEVER_MIND(1) NAME never_mind - You can use it at any time. SYNOPSIS never_mind [ -s context ] [ -I ] [ -ML (model) ] [ -MLS path ] DESCRIPTION "NEVER MIND" is a great phrase which can work at any time. OPTIONS -s context Output a sentence with "never mind" for the input context. -I Search online and try to find a better one. -ML (model) Use our ML model on GitHub to learn how to use "never mind" as a excuse.
